title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

The first point is also earned for a definite integral with an integrand of k−f  x , MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn If the limits are incorrect, the response does not earn the third point.

A response that uses an integrand of f  x −4 : MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGMbGaaGjcVp aabmaabaGaamiEaaGaayjkaiaawMcaaiabgkHiTiaaisdacaaMc8Ua aiOoaaaa@41F1@

  • can earn the third point if it presents correct communication, such as ∫ 0 1 f  x −4   dx =−2 e −2 −2, MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWdXaqaamaabm aabaGaamOzaiaayIW7daqadaqaaiaadIhaaiaawIcacaGLPaaacqGH sislcaaI0aaacaGLOaGaayzkaaGaaGPaVlaaykW7caWGKbGaamiEaa WcbaGaaGimaaqaaiaaigdaa0Gaey4kIipakiabg2da9iabgkHiTiaa ikdacaWGLbWaaWbaaSqabeaacqGHsislcaaIYaaaaOGaeyOeI0IaaG OmaiaacYcaaaa@51A7@ so the area is 2+2 e −2 . MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaaIYaGaey4kaS IaaGOmaiaadwgadaahaaWcbeqaaiabgkHiTiaaikdaaaGccaGGUaaa aa@3ED1@

  • does not earn the third point if it includes incorrect communication, such as ∫ 0 1 f  x −4   dx =2+2 e −2 . MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWdXaqaamaabm aabaGaamOzaiaayIW7daqadaqaaiaadIhaaiaawIcacaGLPaaacqGH sislcaaI0aaacaGLOaGaayzkaaGaaGPaVlaaykW7caWGKbGaamiEaa WcbaGaaGimaaqaaiaaigdaa0Gaey4kIipakiabg2da9iaaikdacqGH RaWkcaaIYaGaamyzamaaCaaaleqabaGaeyOeI0IaaGOmaaaakiaac6 caaaa@50B1@

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

The first point is earned for ∫ 0 1 3x⋅f  x   dx MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWdXaqaaiaaio dacaWG4bGaeyyXICTaamOzaiaayIW7daqadaqaaiaadIhaaiaawIca caGLPaaacaaMc8UaaGPaVlaadsgacaWG4baaleaacaaIWaaabaGaaG ymaaqdcqGHRiI8aaaa@4A9B@ or c  ∫ 0 1 x e −2x  dx , MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGJbGaaGPaVp aapedabaGaamiEaiaadwgadaahaaWcbeqaaiabgkHiTiaaikdacaWG 4baaaOGaaGPaVlaadsgacaWG4baaleaacaaIWaaabaGaaGymaaqdcq GHRiI8aOGaaiilaaaa@47FB@ where c≠0. MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGJbGaeyiyIK RaaGimaiaac6caaaa@3D16@ A response using c≠12, MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGJbGaeyiyIK RaaGymaiaaikdacaGGSaaaaa@3DD1@ for example c=1, MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGJbGaeyypa0 JaaGymaiaacYcaaaa@3C54@ will not earn the fourth point.

Incorrect integrals that require integration by parts are eligible for the second and third points. Both of these points are earned by correctly applying integration by parts at least once.

The second point is earned with an implied u and dv MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGKbGaamODaa aa@3ADF@ in the presence of − x 2 e −2x − ∫ − 1 2 e −2x  dx . MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacqGHsisldaWcaa qaaiaadIhaaeaacaaIYaaaaiaadwgadaahaaWcbeqaaiabgkHiTiaa ikdacaWG4baaaOGaeyOeI0Yaa8qGbeqaaiabgkHiTmaalaaabaGaaG ymaaqaaiaaikdaaaGaamyzamaaCaaaleqabaGaeyOeI0IaaGOmaiaa dIhaaaGccaaMc8UaamizaiaadIhaaSqabeqaniaawUIiaOGaaiOlaa aa@4C64@ This expression also earns the third point.

The tabular method may be used to show integration by parts.

  • In this case, the second point is earned by having evidence to identify u=x MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG1bGaeyypa0 JaamiEaaaa@3BF8@ and dv= e −2x . MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGKbGaamODai abg2da9iaadwgadaahaaWcbeqaaiabgkHiTiaaikdacaWG4baaaOGa aiOlaaaa@405E@

  • The third point is earned for either − x 2 e −2x − ∫ − 1 2 e −2x  dx MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacqGHsisldaWcaa qaaiaadIhaaeaacaaIYaaaaiaadwgadaahaaWcbeqaaiabgkHiTiaa ikdacaWG4baaaOGaeyOeI0Yaa8qGbeqaaiabgkHiTmaalaaabaGaaG ymaaqaaiaaikdaaaGaamyzamaaCaaaleqabaGaeyOeI0IaaGOmaiaa dIhaaaGccaaMc8UaamizaiaadIhaaSqabeqaniaawUIiaaaa@4BA8@ or − x 2 e −2x − 1 4 e −2x . MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacqGHsisldaWcaa qaaiaadIhaaeaacaaIYaaaaiaadwgadaahaaWcbeqaaiabgkHiTiaa ikdacaWG4baaaOGaeyOeI0YaaSaaaeaacaaIXaaabaGaaGinaaaaca WGLbWaaWbaaSqabeaacqGHsislcaaIYaGaamiEaaaakiaac6caaaa@4666@

A response of ∫ x e −2x  dx =− x 2 e −2x − ∫ − 1 2 e −2x  dx MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWdbaqaaiaadI hacaWGLbWaaWbaaSqabeaacqGHsislcaaIYaGaamiEaaaakiaaykW7 caWGKbGaamiEaaWcbeqab0Gaey4kIipakiabg2da9iabgkHiTmaala aabaGaamiEaaqaaiaaikdaaaGaamyzamaaCaaaleqabaGaeyOeI0Ia aGOmaiaadIhaaaGccqGHsisldaWdbaqaaiabgkHiTmaalaaabaGaaG ymaaqaaiaaikdaaaGaamyzamaaCaaaleqabaGaeyOeI0IaaGOmaiaa dIhaaaGccaaMc8UaamizaiaadIhaaSqabeqaniabgUIiYdaaaa@574C@ or ∫ x e −2x  dx =− x 2 e −2x − 1 4 e −2x MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWdbaqaaiaadI hacaWGLbWaaWbaaSqabeaacqGHsislcaaIYaGaamiEaaaakiaaykW7 caWGKbGaamiEaaWcbeqab0Gaey4kIipakiabg2da9iabgkHiTmaala aabaGaamiEaaqaaiaaikdaaaGaamyzamaaCaaaleqabaGaeyOeI0Ia aGOmaiaadIhaaaGccqGHsisldaWcaaqaaiaaigdaaeaacaaI0aaaai aadwgadaahaaWcbeqaaiabgkHiTiaaikdacaWG4baaaaaa@50EB@ (with or without explicit mention of u or dv MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGKbGaamODaa aa@3ADF@ ) earns the second and third points.

The second and third points are unaffected by missing or incorrect limits of integration.

The fourth point is earned only for the correct answer; the value of the volume does not need to be simplified. Any error in simplification does not earn the fourth point.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

The first point is earned for ∫ 0 1 1+ f ′ x 2  dx MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWdXaqaamaaka aabaGaaGymaiabgUcaRmaabmaabaGabmOzayaafaWaaeWaaeaacaWG 4baacaGLOaGaayzkaaaacaGLOaGaayzkaaWaaWbaaSqabeaacaaIYa aaaaqabaGccaaMc8UaamizaiaadIhaaSqaaiaaicdaaeaacaaIXaaa niabgUIiYdaaaa@47B0@ or ∫ 0 1 1+ −8 e −2x 2  dx , MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWdXgqabaWaaO aaaeaaqaaaaaaaaaWdbiaaigdacqGHRaWkdaqadaWdaeaapeGaeyOe I0IaaGioaiaadwgapaWaaWbaaSqabeaapeGaeyOeI0IaaGOmaiaadI haaaaakiaawIcacaGLPaaapaWaaWbaaSqabeaapeGaaGOmaaaaa8aa beaakiaaykW7peGaamizaiaadIhaaSWdaeaacaaIWaaabaGaaGymaa qdcaGLRicakiaacYcaaaa@4AA9@ with or without the differential.

The first line of the model solution earns both points.

A response of ∫ 0 1 1+ f ′   x 2 +5+4 e −2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaahqart1ev3aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWdXaqaamaaka aabaGaaGymaiabgUcaRmaabmaabaGabmOzayaafaGaaGjcVpaabmaa baGaamiEaaGaayjkaiaawMcaaaGaayjkaiaawMcaamaaCaaaleqaba GaaGOmaaaaaeqaaaqaaiaaicdaaeaacaaIXaaaniabgUIiYdGccqGH RaWkcaaI1aGaey4kaSIaaGinaiaadwgadaahaaWcbeqaaiabgkHiTi aaikdaaaaaaa@4BC6@ earns the first point but does not earn the second point. (The integrand is ambiguous due to the missing dx. The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes both of the criteria below.
